description: Led and participated in the development and cloud deployment of custom web applications for clients across various industries, with a primary focus on the finance and accounting sectors. Additionally, contributed to the creation of internal products for Novancy Studios and the development of SaaS solutions designed to enhance efficiency and automate business processes.

Developed and delivered high-quality websites and web applications for a variety of prominent clients, including GlobalHealth, Grupo Corripio, Lanco, and Digo Hispanic Media, among others. These projects spanned various industries, ensuring tailored and high-impact solutions.

Contributed to the maintenance and development of new features for internal software and SaaS solutions targeted at the company’s clients. Also collaborated in obtaining certification from the Ministry of Finance, supporting key standards compliance in the company’s products.
